title: Garments of Death and Garments of Light
description:
In the Christian tradition, it is said that Adam and Eve were covered garments of light or garments of glory before the fall.  After the fall, they are covered in garments of dead skins.  I try to show what these traditions mean in relation to Being.  

I also explore the interesting relationship between the two garments and how the relationships is revealed to us in certain persistent mistakes of translation or of transcription which nonetheless show us an underlying pattern of the world.  

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
